website_summaries.verdict: A great way to add some basic lighting to an outdoor space like a patio or porch. Fits a variety of decor styles.
pros: Adds a great deal of illumination using a simple bulb
Easy to replace bulb when necessary
cons: Globe light is difficult to use outdoors

customer_reviews.title: The light is beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful...worked great in our entryway but shipping took forever and the box was mutilated till it ever arrived. Thankfully everything inside was still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - glass globe is not secured  well
customer_reviews.text: Fixture is poorly built and the glass globe is only secured with a threaded plastic part that is easily stripped (which mine is). The 'holder' part on top of the globe is for appearances only. On a better quality fixture that would be holding the glass to the fixture with the three bolts. I do not trust this design and would return but I waited too long before opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Farmhouse Light
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this light. It is a little smaller than I was expecting but it still looks perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: Easiy installed looks great, exactly what I wanted, the glass is easy to change, and also wouldn’t require a wall switch as it has one built in.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Joe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly with prime, wonderful quality, and packaged well. My husband put it together in about 25 minutes. May order another for upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It did not include installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Love it. It did not include installation instructions, but customer service did email them to me upon request.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light - base leans cooler/orange in natural light
customer_reviews.text: Love the light overall. Looks modern and not overpowering above my sink. The only thing I dislike somewhat is that the bass color leans copper/orange-ish in natural light. Wish it were more on the brushed gold side but overall we’re really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L. Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. the base does not look cheap. Is good

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant lights
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant lights. We bought 3 of these lights and had them up in an hour. Perfect size and put off a good amount of light since the glass is clear. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but .........
customer_reviews.text: The light was impossible to hang because of the way it has been assembled at the factory. Fingers crossed it hangs on with the few bolts we could get in the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Oncken

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great looking light
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light. We looked at a few stores before we found this on amazon. It arrived well packaged and was easy to put together. Looks just like the pictures posted.
customer_reviews.author: Jalco

customer_reviews.title: Hallway light has become a show stopper
customer_reviews.text: People literally stop in my hallways to comment on this fixture. I had bought it as a quick and inexpensive fix. It’s becomih permanent. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra S Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The lights were much nicer than the picture! I added a ceiling medallion and painted to match the finish of the lights. Together that look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Beta

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.text: ‘Twas east to install and looks great with an Edison bulb (not included), especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

feature_bullets: E26, bulb NOT included. Available bulb Type: LED; Compact Fluorescent (CFL); Halogen; Incandescent.
The 1-Light Semi-Flush Mount Ceiling Fixture adds a rustic feel to your home with a globe glass shade.Complete the look with a trendy vintage style bulb.
Canopy: 4.7" D x 0.79" H; Shade: 7.9" D x 10.6" H; Hardwired (Installation Required); Includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation.
Ceiling-mounted design, compatible with most octagonal, round or square junction boxes. You also can install the fixture as a wall light sconce.
